price: Basi nitakapo mkamilisha na nikampulizia roho yangu, basi mumwangukie kumsujudia.
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: Nikisha kamilisha kumuumba, na nikampulizia roho ambayo ninaimiliki, basi teremkeni kwa nyuso zenu mkimsujudia, kwa kumwamkia na kumhishimu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
